summary: VEHICLE SHUTS OFF UNEXPECTEDLY, GAS GAUGE SUDDENLY DROPS TO EMPTY, VEHICLE WILL SUDDENLY REGISTER INVALID KEY FOB. VEHICLE HAS SUDDENLY STOPPED ON CITY STREET 5 TIMES IN PASS 3 MOS. RESEARCHED YEAR, MAKE AND MODEL, FOUND THERE IS A RECALL. CALLED DEALERSHIP, THEY STATE MY VIN NUMBER IS NOT INCLUDED IN RECALL. I FEEL CAR IS UNSAFE TO DRIVE. CAN'T AFFORD REPAIR TO PCM, NOR TCM. WOULD COST OVER 1,000 DOLLARS AT DEALERSHIP. CAR NOT REPAIRED AS OF 7-24-2017
